╭── ​ᓚᕠᗢ NattyUI Simple Elements ──╶╴╴
│ 
│ ╸╸╺╸╺━━━ This is a H1 heading element ━━━╺╸╺╸╸
│ 
│ ╴╶╴╶─═══ This is a H2 heading element ═══─╶╴╶╴
│ 
│ ▍ This is a
│ ▍ multi-line quotation
│ 
│ ╴╶╴╶─── This is a H3 heading element ───╶╴╶╴
│ ✓ This is a multi-line message
│   with a leading checkmark.
│ 
│ ════ This is a H4 heading element ════
│ 
│ ━━━━ This is a H5 heading element ━━━━
│ 
│ ──── This is a H6 heading element ────
╰────╶╴╴
